artist: Artist: Costantino Cumano; Designer: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: old woman seated in 3/4 view wearing a black fur shawl and black headdress with veil down the back; hands in her lap; facing to the L of the picture plane; matted and in frame with four other prints
markings: no marks on verso; could be mounted to backing sheet
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Rembrandt's Mother
